page.title: 19SCHOOL BY MARIE LAWRENCE (8)
page.content: I like being at school because we do interesting things and in the morning we have assembly and we sing songs. When we come back from assembly we do some reading then we talk about things with Mrs MacMillan.In school we have a pet hamster called Sammy and at weekends some people take him home. When we are at school we do lots of things like rounders netball football and P.E. recorders and lots more. On Fridays Mr Thomas comes and reads us a story and we do a bit of writing and a picture about it. Sometimes we go for walks and trips with school. One day we went for a walk up to the trees and did some bark rubbing. On Tuesdays we do Sound Sense and we do some sums in the morning. In the afternoon we have playtime. And today I am doing some hand writing. Marie Lawrence Age 8.
